title: Drawing, "Study for Merchants Prefer Shell, for Shell-Mex", 1933
medium: Brush and gouache on black paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: In the center, within a frame, a crane lifts a packing case inscribed in white: F.O.B. London; dots on either side. Title in red, below: MERCHANTS PREFER SHELL; above in gray: YOU CAN BE SURE OF SHELL.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study for Merchants Prefer Shell, for Shell-Mex", 1933.
1933. Brush and gouache on black paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-538.
